---

    Code
      constructive::construct(combined_grouped_snapshot)
    Output
      tibble::tibble(
        year = rep(2019:2020, each = 12L),
        spatial_unit = rep("Aargau", 24L),
        age = rep(rep(c("age_00_19", "age_20_64", "age_65_"), 2), each = 4L),

        n_bench = c(

    Code
      constructive::construct(prepare_evaluation(data_benchmark = data_benchmark,
        data_projected = data_projected_NA, drop_start_year = TRUE))
    Message <cliMessage>
      Warning message:
      [36mâ„¹[39m Preparing download...
      The following columns have missing values:
      [36mâ„¹[39m Preparing download...
      ! "n_proj".

      measures that cannot be properly interpreted.

      constructive::construct(prepare_evaluation(data_benchmark = data_benchmark_NA,
